creator: christoph.huesler@css.ch
text:
Project.setBaseDir(File) and Project.setBasedir(String) are inconsistently 
named.

creator: peterreilly@apache.org
text:
This is true, however these are both public methods
and so we cannot remove one. Adding a setBaseDir(String) would
be confusing - so I am rejecting this bug. However, thanks
for looking over the code.
